story_ch0064_00_rival_07_09000/2401_1201:
Before we begin, I’d like to thank you for your
time, President Lusamine.

Now, what did you want to discuss with
me and my foundation?

I’d like to have a chat about Team Break—that
group causing problems all over Pasio.
Today, this man will also be joining us.

I’m hoping to discuss amongst ourselves how we
should proceed.
